apiKey.name: Runware API Key
apiKey.hint: Your Runware API key for image generation. Get one at https://runware.ai

defaultModel.name: Default Model
defaultModel.hint: The default AI model to use for image generation (e.g., runware:100@1)

imageWidth.name: Image Width
imageWidth.hint: Default width for generated images in pixels

imageHeight.name: Image Height
imageHeight.hint: Default height for generated images in pixels

numberResults.name: Number of Results
numberResults.hint: How many images to generate per request (1-4)

prompt.title: Image Prompt
prompt.positiveHint: Describe what you want to see in the image
prompt.negativeHint: Optional: Describe what you want to avoid in the image

model.title: Model Configuration
model.label: AI Model
model.hint: The AI model to use for generation

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.loraHint: Optional LoRA model for style adaptation
advanced.stepsHint: Number of denoising steps (more = higher quality, slower)
advanced.cfgScaleHint: How closely to follow the prompt (higher = more literal)
advanced.seedHint: For reproducible results, use the same seed

notifications.noApiKey: Please configure your Runware API key in module settings.

setAsImage.title: Set as Actor Image?
setAsImage.content: Would you like to set this as the actor's portrait image?
